lead_paragraph: Mr. Garcia cited a lack of leadership at the top of FIFA and said he had lost confidence in the independence of his ethics committee colleague Hans-Joachim Eckert.
snippet: Mr. Garcia cited a lack of leadership at the top of FIFA and said he had lost confidence in the independence of his ethics committee colleague Hans-Joachim Eckert.
